alert.note: Alert for Des Moines (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 8:44PM CDT until May 25 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Keithsburg affecting Des Moines, Mercer, Henderson and Louisa Counties. Mississippi River at Burlington affecting Hancock, Des Moines, Lee and Henderson Counties. Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Des Moines and Henderson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Sunday, the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Thursday morning and continue falling to 9.0 feet May 28th. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued early Monday morning.
